Reviews.Title: Be Careful!
Reviews.Author: S. Wood
Reviews.Content: CAVEAT EMPTOR!!!  First, the phone is great. I ordered the version with 32GB of internal memory (reduced to 25.5GB after subtracting all the standard features that run by default).  I also purchased a SanDisk Ultra 64 GB microSDXC Class 10 UHS-1 Memory Card 30MB/s with Adapter SDSDQUA-064G-U46A external card (giving me an extra 59.45GB despite the statement in the User Manual that only cards up to 32GB could be used). One reviewer said he had to format his card but mine just worked automatically. The Quick Guide was in Romanian but you can get the full User Manual in English by doing a Google search for "GT-I9300 User Manual."  The included external charger has international electrical prongs but my seller included a US converter so that I could plug it in here.  The original converter did not work and they sent me another one.  The phone can also be charged by connecting it to the computer using the supplied USB cable.  When charging, phones can draw at a maximum of 500mA (milliamps) from a standard USB port but can draw at 1000mA (one amp) from the standard Samsung charger.  I also got a second charger Samsung OEM 1.0A Original Home Wall AC Travel Charger Adapter + USB 2.0 Data Sync Connect Transfer Charge Cable because in addition to charging my phone faster while I am at home, this also supplied another USB to Micro USB cable (albeit a very short one) that can be used to connect the phone to my home computer for other reasons, so I can keep one cable at home and one at work.  There were a number of complaints from people who thought they had received knockoffs of this charger instead of the actual OEM so I went through the sellers and picked one that had "Fulfillment By Amazon," in the (perhaps vain) hope that this would provide some sort of quality assurance, even though it doubled the price (still 1/3 of the price listed on Samsung's website).  Samsung also sells a charger that is only 700mA so make sure you don't order that one.  I also purchased this case Acase Samsung Galaxy S3 Case - Superleggera PRO Dual Layer Protection (Black/Black) (Fits AT&T;, Sprint, T-Mobile and Verizon) which fits like a glove, keeps all the external controls accessible, and appears quite adequate to protect the phone if dropped.  Finally, I went with this screen protector [Ultimate Clear Plus] Samsung Galaxy S3 Rearth Ringbo Screen Protector for [Sprint At&t; T-Mobile Verizon US Cellular Unlocked i9300 3G GSM] Cover Film [2 PACK], which also seems to work well.  I've seen some complaints that the plastic sheets are smaller than the screen but (a) this is because the screen is beveled at the edges, (b) it only leaves about 1/8 inch on each side, and (c) much of that is covered by the case anyway. (By the way, the International version of the Galaxy S3 can only be used on GSM networks, such as AT&T;, Cingular, and T-Mobile, and not on CDMA networks, such as Verizon, Sprint, Alltel, and US Cellular.  Also, the International version has a more advanced processor: a quad-core vs. the dual-core for the US versions, but that doesn't seem to have an impact on the speed of most things you'll do on the phone (see the speed comparison tests on YouTube).  This might change when more apps are written to take advantage of the quad-core, the primary benefit being in the area of multitasking.  The quad-core does not currently support the 4G used in the United States, but there has been word that sometime in 2012 Samsung will release an unlocked International LTE version that does. If you need 4G and you don't want to wait you might take a look at this one Samsung Galaxy SIII S3 SGH-I747 Blue AT&T; 4G LTE Unlocked Cell Phone No Contract No Warranty - AT&T; Logos [Carrier Retail Packaging], which also has only 16GB of internal memory.  The US version also has 2GB of RAM vs 1GB for the International version, apparently because the additional RAM is necessary for 4G, but the International version has a Wolfson DAC (digital-to-analog converter) for superior audio, while the DAC in the US versions is not as celebrated.) OK, enough of that.The problem was that the first time I ordered this phone I received instead the one with 16GB of internal memory, and the seller (New Generation Products, AKA Cell GSM) threw a 16GB external card into the box.  Now, I had paid $90 more for this than the 16GB version was going for on Amazon and the 16GB external card that they included is available on Amazon for $10.69.  Anybody want that deal?I contacted the seller and they said that they were very sorry about my misunderstanding and that perhaps I should have asked them whether the 32GB was with or without an external card.  I pointed out that the description they had running that very day said "This Brand New Samsung Galaxy S III 32GB Internal memory phone comes in Original box with all Original accessories in the box."  They replied "32GB Internal memory does not necessarly means 32GB Memory on the motherboard, since 16GB card also means internal, external would be if you connect USB to it and have memory on USB."But, they said I could return it as long as the phone was unused and in "Brand New Condition."  Fortunately as soon as I spotted the 16GB external card I went no further and the phone was still in brand new condition.  I wonder how many people purchased from this seller and did not discover the issue until well after the phone was no longer in brand new condition.I then sent inquiries to some other sellers, asking if the 32GB was on the "main circuit board."  The person at FGS Trading said that he would have "somebody from the electronic dept advise" but never got back to me.  I ended up ordering from Addicted To Phones and received the correct phone in a reasonable amount of time.Fortunately, New Generation Products issued a credit card refund immediately upon receiving the phone back and I am wiser, if $10 (the cost of returning the phone) poorer.  If you are ordering the 32GB version I recommend sending an email to the seller before purchasing, explicitly asking if the 32GB is on the main circuit board (and also, if the charger will have international electrical prongs, whether a US converter will be included).  Where Amazon.com is while this type of thing is going on I don't know.POSTSCRIPT:After posting the above I received a contrite phone call from New Generation Products (Cell GSM), grieved that they had neglected to reimburse me for the cost of returning the phone and wishing to do so in order to optimize my consumer experience.  They sent me a check to cover my return shipping cost in full, and requested somewhat urgently that I delete my review because it was hurting their sales.  It then occurred to me where Amazon is while this type of thing is going on.  In addition to whatever private action they take, by allowing reviews like this to bring such activity to light they enable the marketplace to supply an appropriate remedy, from which other sellers can then draw a lesson.  Furthermore, I would have been protected by the Amazon "A-to-Z Guarantee" since I contacted the seller about returning the phone within a week of receiving it.

Reviews.Title: NOT 32GB INTERNAL MEMORY
Reviews.Author: Ignacio
Reviews.Content: The phone is really ok.I recived it on time as informed, and its included external charger for international electrical.The problem is that I ordered the version with 32GB of internal memory like the title of the product said "Samsung Galaxy S III S3 GT-i9300 32GB Factory Unlocked Android Smartphone - International Version, No warranty (Pebble Blue)" but instead I recieved the one with 16GB of internal memory with an extra 16GB microsd external memory.The worst part of all is that I had the precaution and wrote an email to New Generation Products before buying the phone to be sure that it was 32GB internal memory, and they gave me false information. I clearly asked them if it was 32gb internal memory or it was 16gb internal + 16gb micro sd, and THEY RESPONDED IT WAS 32GB INTERNAL MEMORY. THAT IS NOT TRUE!!!

Reviews.Title: 32 gig quad core Samsung Galaxy SIII
Reviews.Author: huntinbob06
Reviews.Content: Tmobile wouldn't sell me a 32 gig phone without a 2 year extension on my contract. There was no way I was signing an extension. I searched for the just released 32 gig phone on Amazon and found the european quad core version that was unlocked from the factory. I checked with Tmobile and Samsung that this phone would work on my current Tmobile plan, and they both said yes. I pulled the trigger and two days later I had my 32 gig phone attached to my account without an extension. I bought the 64gig card from Amazon and now have a rockin 96gig phone that I can take to any carrier when my contract is up. This phone blows away the iphone. Screaming fast, HD screen,ice cream sandwich operating system,  easy to set up programs. As long as you buy an unlocked phone, you can run it on anyones network. This turned out to be a really good choice for me. I love this phone.

Reviews.Title: Better then I've expected
Reviews.Author: Yuliya
Reviews.Content: Ok , here it goes. After reading all of reviews I wasn't sure what to expect.I did order my phone from  Transformersandgsmphones and was anxiously waiting and  hoping that I  would not have to send it back for any kind of replacement( based on reviews ). As it happened I didnt. Phone arrived in time, in  sealed packaged box and had 32GB written on it. So I knew that THEY  knew what I  wanted.I did however checked config as soon as I turned it on.It seemed that  phone was oriented for Australia as it has preset English ( Australian) and Australian GPS  maps preloaded as well.Which I  am happy for since all the docs  come in English too. So far I am still playing and learning all the futures but already can tell that it  did exceeded ALL my  expectation. I honestly  dont  see what is there to compare with I PHONE  when it is clear that Samsung is THE  best and I  LOVE IT.

Reviews.Title: Wow factor! way behind iPhone (full comparison)
Reviews.Author: Luca Cascianini
Reviews.Content: I got the S3 yesterday, since I owned a iPhone 4S here the comparison:DESIGN: Galaxy S3 design is stunning, the feeling on hands is incredible. The ergonomics makes all the difference. The iPhone 4S is very squarish and definitely more solid but heavier too (way heavier);SCREEN: Galaxy S3 screen is wonderful with vivid colours and sharp imaages, 4,8 inches vs 3.5 of the iPhone, after you make the transition you wont never come back, impossible.OPERATING SYSTEM: S3 usability is a boom. iPhone is good but never at the level of the S3, way way slower.BATTERY: S3 gets full day + 30% remaining battery, iPhone last till four or five PM;GPS: Galaxy S3 gets locked in less than 10 seconds inside a building, iPhone searches and searches with no success;CAMERA: they are very similar, S3 is faster and iPhone is may be a bit better in term of quality. No dramatic difference.S-VOICE vs SIRI: they are both very basic and more fun than usefull.USB-BLUETOOTH: iPhone only works with iTunes, no Bluetooth, no radio. Galaxy S3 can be usb-connected to computers and flashmemory, it has easy bluetooth connection and yes ... it has an amazing radio :)APPS: to be sincere, all relevants apps in iPhones are present in Android. They have better design but they are at payment while in Android are always free. No mayor differences.Galaxy S3 is an extraordinary good purchase. Recommended for all ex-iPhone users. You wont regret, there is a world outside iTunes :)

Reviews.Title: Samsun Galaxy III Unlocked International
Reviews.Author: SGII-Unlocked
Reviews.Content: This is a great phone.  I have no issues with it so far.  I have had it for over a month going on 2 months now.  Works as advertised.  I believe that you will enjoy this phone as much as I am enjoying it.  The only thing that I do not like, and there may be more things that I have not found out about as of yet, but I do not like the fact that I can not set a Date/time stamp on pictures/images.  I need to find a third party software to do that.  There should be a touch button to activate/de-activate Date/time stamp as part of the phone.  At this point in time, other then the date/time stamp on my pictures I have no complaints about this product.  I think it is great.

Reviews.Title: Galaxy SIII
Reviews.Author: Val
Reviews.Content: I've simply & literally run out of words...totally speechless...does it get any better than this? I have the G-Tab 10.1, SII, SIII, Samsung Refrigerator, Samsung Smart Tv...None can compare, Samsung whatever your doing just keep doing it...cause I'm really enjoying it

Reviews.Title: Great!
Reviews.Author: Luan
Reviews.Content: Great product and seller. One important thing to say is that it's a Australian Optus branded SIII. So, if you want to remove the Optus logo on boot, a new firmware should be installed.

Reviews.Title: NOT 32gb INTERNATIONAL VERSION
Reviews.Author: Wilfrend A. Yepez A
Reviews.Content: I have a problem, I ordered a Samsung Galaxy S III GT-i9300 S3 Factory 32GB Unlocked Android Smartphone - International Version, no Warranty (Blue Pebble), as described on the website, model GT-i9300-32GB-BLUE, and I received was a Samsung Galaxy S III S3 i747 aT & T, please to do in my case.

Reviews.Title: Just got it
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: They forgot to say that this phone is a GSM so it won't work with T-Mobile 4G LTE network . It sucks i just got it and I'm on T-Mobile :( other than that it's amazing .

Reviews.Title: Best Phone Ever
Reviews.Author: HSP
Reviews.Content: Effectively this is the 32gb internal, international version, fully unlocked. It works perfectively with my carrier on Costa Rica, so it should has to work with any GSM provider on the world.Battery problems? NONE... just buy it if you can...!

Reviews.Title: At the next level!
Reviews.Author: David Cave
Reviews.Content: My first android phone was an HTC HD2 converted from windows phone.I replaced that with a Samsung Galaxy S 2 which was an amazing experience and now I replaced my Galaxy S 2 with this phone and it has not disappointed in any way! The screen is gorgeous, It is extremely light given the size. Best of all the operating system is amazingly smooth with zero lag. No matter how much apps I load or open it handles them all. All I can say is that it performs absolutely flawlessly! This all means that you can easily do so much practical things with the phone e.g, mp3 player for running, GPS tracking device, turn by turn directions, keep track of appointments and contacts etc....and the list goes on . It does it all without even stuttering! Samsung seems to produce phones that simply outperforms all others

Reviews.Title: Great phone!
Reviews.Author: Michelle V
Reviews.Content: I bought this version because it has 32gb of space versus the 16 on the other models and I am so glad I did.  I have tons of music and movies and apps to keep myself and my youngest son entertained and don't have to worry about erasing anything.  As a phone it works great, rarely have signals problems but if there are I guess I could blame T-mobile for that.  Also works great with at&t;, my son used his sim card and tested it out.Didn't think I could get used to the virtual keyboard at first since my last phone had been an blackberry and I was so used to the physical keyboard but I did.

Reviews.Title: Arrived in time!
Reviews.Author: Rui Afonso Stracke "nozama"
Reviews.Content: The "no wireless gps system" of the device doens't work til now in the S3. Thanks to my old nokia 703, could find the ways.After some google, I saw I have to reset the device and then setup a new firmware.

Reviews.Title: Samsung Galaxy SIII GT-19300 32 GB Factory Unlocked Android Smartphone
Reviews.Author: Linda Bost
Reviews.Content: This also was sent overseas as part of a scam.  I wish I had this back as I would certainly like to have one myself

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Homero Murzi
Reviews.Content: very good benefit/price ratio excellent deal good product. Design and quality are great, so far very happy with my purchase.

Reviews.Title: Problem with Charger
Reviews.Author: Tuba Nur Dönmez
Reviews.Content: Smartphone is ok but charger is not eligible for us. They sent me chinese charger and it broken down in 4 months.

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: Zilla T
Reviews.Content: It's hard to go wrong with Samsung.  The phone has worked well since I took it out of the box.  I have no complaints

Reviews.Title: ronald
Reviews.Author: ronald delgado
Reviews.Content: los mejores precios para comprar se consigue buenos articulos de todo para todos niños adulto mujeres para todo el mundo

Reviews.Title: Best Phone Ever
Reviews.Author: Rosendo
Reviews.Content: This phone does it all. I can put any chip on it and it works instantly. I had to cut a regurar SIM Card to a mini SIm and it worked with no issues. It's so versatile and the screen size is pefect, not too big, not too small...this phone got it just right.

Reviews.Title: best phone with no two year contract attach
Reviews.Author: Vinh T.
Reviews.Content: its a very good phone..i paid full price for the phone to avoid the 2 year carrier contract..i bought my sgs3 32g  from hasselfreecell.very good customer service...item was exactly as advertise..i would purchase from them again...

Reviews.Title: Okay, I'm very happy. Thanks.The product is of good quality. I loved it. Thanks for everything. GOOD. GOOD. GOOD
Reviews.Author: Corporacion Pentium 2005
Reviews.Content: Okay, I'm very happy. Thanks.The product is of good quality. I loved it. Thanks for everything. GOOD. GOOD. GOOD

Reviews.Title: Recomendacion
Reviews.Author: Hangelber
Reviews.Content: Excelente producto, justo a tiempo en la entrega y recibido de acuerdo a lo comprado. Vendedor responsables, 100% lo recomiendo

Reviews.Title: This is my dream smart phone
Reviews.Author: Daniel Mwakasungula
Reviews.Content: I admired this smart phone just after reading through its specifications. When I received, I have proved that it is more than what I expected. Now I am still learning how to tap its full potential and believe that I have received the most and I expect that the best is yet to come

Reviews.Title: S3 - The Beast!!!
Reviews.Author: Avinash
Reviews.Content: I had got my Samsung Galaxy S3 a month ago from amazon...it was my first product to buy from amazon..and bought it from seller stylevie ...they packed and shipped it very carefully!!Now about the product...It was awesome phone to have...some what like little computer..lolSCREEN :Thanx to Gorilla glass...the scratches were not caught on screen atol..but better to have a screen protecter and a good case to avoid any damage..becoz i dropped it two times :P but nothing happened becoz of case :)TOUCH:The touch was buttery smooth u'll njoy it!!CAMERA:-The camera was also too good and take pictures very clearly and 1080p video quality was also excellent with continues auto focus (and can take good pictures while recording video).-The front camera also takes 720P video!!!!! :DBATTERY:It'll take around 2 1/2 (2.5 hrs)for fully charging from 0 to 100%...and it will be run for about 14hrs with more usage and it lasts for a day by normal usage....there was power saving mode option and u can increase its running time...HEATING UP:Not at all, u see S3 doest heat soo much as it was heated in S2....if u use mobile for hours by playing games ,watching videos or browsing net there will be a very little heat at downpart of the phoneSOFTWARE :As u know Icecream sandwich was really excellent and running good on s3 and the jellybean update will be coming in a few months too!!!!!!CONNECTIVITY :The bluetooth version is 4.0 which is very latest...there is wi-fi...u can connect to usb's using a USB on the go cable...and u can also connect to specially designed keyboards , mouse ,...etc.,PERFORMANCE :It is a quad core processor!!!! no lags atol and and it was smooth while scrolling even more than dozen of apps are running... :DFEATURES:-It has many features like s-voice , s-beam , pop-up play etc., The S-voice was also good like apple's siri :)-The S-beam was also good ....and i like very much the feature called pop up play....u can pop up video that is playing and u can keep the video any where u want on the big screen.It was not laggy and was so smooth to move over the screen and can simultaneously can do texting browse net etc.,-when we open video player u can see thumbnails playing a little preview of video and u can easily select the video u want :)-samsung touchwiz also very good :)-slide ur hand on screen and take screenshot-tap on top to move to top of the list u r scrolling , smart stay , Direct call....what can i say there were many features like these..! :DDISPLAY :It was 720P resolution display which is very nice to view videos,while playing games etc.,...however in sunlight there will be little dissapointment...but keeping the brightness to full u can see even bright light :)APPS:U have tons of apps in google play store...and the HD games which have more size also run very smooth.. :)STORAGE:I have 32gb internal memory(29Gb available for storage) which is enough :)But i bought another 32GB external memory card...now my storage was huge(64GB)!!!!!!!while installing apps..app2sd was not working at present which is used to install apps to sd cardso i loaded music videos and other stuff to sd card and installed apps on phone memory so that i can manage perfectly :)POCKETABILITY:The S3 was a big phone .its about 5 inch mobile ....first i doubted whether it fits perfectly in my pocket...when i kept my phone in pocket(jeans or normal) it fits perfectly!!!! The phone was thin and happily fits in pocket no worries :)Finally i can say onething Samsung Galaxy S3 was an awesome phone to have and its a Beast!!!!!!!!!! :D :)Note : i can see all 32gb versions selling here are australian unlocked mobiles..so getting logo of them while rebooting and small crap apps of them and im not reciving update early...may i'll get update when released in aus. which will release very slowly :'( ..  i got international samsung unlocked 16gb version and got updates very early :D

Reviews.Title: Very nice smart phone
Reviews.Author: Bing Zhu
Reviews.Content: I have used it for two months, everything works well. Very nice screen and stereo sound. The seeler's shipments are quick and well. I received the phone within their promissed term of time.

Reviews.Title: A phone that is almost to powerful!
Reviews.Author: Traintech86
Reviews.Content: I had an S2 and was on the fence of upgrading. A friend said he would buy my S2 if i did so i went looking into it. I read some reviews of sellers putting "32gb" and then selling  16gb with an SD card so i was worried. I contacted "HastleFreeCell"  and asked for details. I was promptly assured this was a 32gb version with no tricks. They sent it and i have been nothing but pleased ever since.** 1 thng i did notice is that this phone seems to be an AUS version. I am using it here in japan but its international version so there shouldnt be any issues.

Reviews.Title: Amazing Phone
Reviews.Author: Álex Julián
Reviews.Content: This phone is AWESOME. It deserves 10 stars. It worth every penny (unlike the expensive iPhone5 made by crApple)Screen: This phone has overpassed EVERY expectatives. It has a beautiful screen... once you see the vivid colors on the SuperAmoled HD Screen you dont want anything else: retina display looks ugly beside SGS3 screen colors.Camera: It has good frontal and back cameras without the redish color of the cheappy iPhone5 camera.Software: I think that quality is more relevant than quantity. It's true that Applestore has a lot of apps, but the really usefull apps are also available in android, so I think that an open alternative like android is a far better option. Also is noticeable that SGS3 has the well known Google maps, so you wont be an iLost in a twisted "Inception-like" crApple maps app. Google users won't be insulted by the company's CEO asking them to use another app instead the preinstalled app.Batery life: The SGS3 battery last a whole day even with intensive online use and processor demanding apps (ie games).Processor: This version has a quad-core processor that runs every app I've tested very smoothly. This quad-core processor has overpassed the iPhone 5 in the most demanding benchmarksMemory: If you have a phone with 32GB internal memory probably you won't ever need an external memory card, however you can always put a 64GB micrSD card (the user manual indicates that only cards up to 32GB could be used, but my 64GB card has been working great). Additionally I don't know exactly why, but when I registered my S3 at my free dropbox account, I received aditional 48 GB of cloud storage.Sharing: An open platform (ie android) allows you to share your files in many ways: across a standard micro usb cable or by bluetooth file transfering and even by S-Beam: an amazingly fast file-sharing mode which allows to share big files extraordinarily fast without cables (over WiFi direct).Compatibility: in the improbable case you get run out of battery charge you can always ask a friend for a standard microUSB charger and simply plug it on any usb port to charge your smartphone. That simple, not worrying about incompatible cables or plugs.Before samsung there wasn't really any outstanding smartphone: SGS3 doesn't fade the screen if you're staring at it because SGS3 "watch" your eyes and if you are staring at your phone, it's screen will stay on. That is a smart feature :) Another smart feature: if you have a contact on your screen and you rise the phone near your ear, your smartphone will dial the contact: THAT is a smart feature.If you were an iPhone user... you will LOVE the SGS3 even more if you try it. Don't waste your money in a normal crApple phone if you can have a SMARTphone

Reviews.Title: My Purchasing Experience
Reviews.Author: Vaughn Jardine
Reviews.Content: First the phone. Excellent phone, but you already know that or you would not be here wanting to purchase one.Now I want to concentrate on my purchasing experience. After reading a couple of horror stories where buyers  received a 16GB phone plus 16GB microsd card instead of 32GB internal memory ... and the seller trying to convince one of the buyers that a microsd card is considered internal (LOL), I was very skeptical to make my purchase. I read all the reviews, and one reviewer in the comments section said he received the proper phone from Transformersandgsmphones. I implore you to not only read the reviews but also the "comments" link at the bottom of reviews where reviewers respond to questions.I took another reviewer's advice and sent a message to all the Amazon re-sellers asking about the phone and memory. There were several re-sellers and Transformersandgsmphones were the last on my list since they have shipping charges, while the others do not, and I wasn't too keen on that. They were, however, the first to respond (within 15 minutes). Only one other re-seller responded which came the following day. What impressed me about Transformersandgsmphones apart from their quick response was the content of that response, and I quote verbatim "Confirmed 32GB internal and not 16GB phone plus 16GB microsd". What more proof do I want than that? They went on to say that they include a US adapter for the wall charger, and to top that they left a number so I could contact them if I had any more questions about the phone. This was more than enough reassurance for me to pay their $4.99 shipping and have a peace of mind.Next came the shipping. I made the purchase via Amazon in the night and the following morning the phone was shipped, then the following day the phone arrived, considerably earlier than the estimated delivery date.The phone is everything it was hyped up to be, and my purchasing experience was simply awesome. So take my advice - if you are looking to purchase this phone, invariably you should pay the extra $4.99 shipping charge, and get the peace of mind I got by purchasing it from Transformersandgsmphones via Amazon. Great buy!!

Reviews.Title: Best cell phone in the market
Reviews.Author: libriu
Reviews.Content: It's the best cell phone available in the market. I really am very satisfied with it. Everything was fine with my product and it's very very good. I love it.

ProductInfo.Features:
The Galaxy S III is powered by Samsung's Exynos quad-core 1.4GHz processor, which is based on the the ARM Cortex A9. It has a 4.8-inch super AMOLED screen with a resolution of 1280-by-720 pixels, which is housed in a shell that is 8.6 millimeters thick and weighs 133 grams.
FEATURES: 4.8" Amoled HD screen The S3's enormous screen feels big in the hand, although the device is just 16 per cent larger than its predecessor, the 20 million selling S2.
Smart Stay: The phone tracks your eyes, so as long as you're looking at it, the display won't dim or turn off.
Direct Call: If you've got a contact on your screen, there's no need to hit call: simply hold the device up to your face and the number will be dialed automatically.
Smart Alert: Burst shot and best photo The 8MP camera now offers a 20-shot burst mode and will choose the best photo for you. Photos are now possible at the same time as video filming.
ProductInfo.Name: Samsung Galaxy S III S3 GT-i9300 32GB Factory Unlocked Android Smartphone - International Version, No warranty (Pebble Blue)
